name: Heroes of the Sky
description:
In this game you fly a plane over two islands. The objective of the game is to destroy the 20 buildings on the opponents island. You can destroy buildings by dropping bombs, firing rockets or "kamikaze" your plane on them. However, if you run out of planes, you have lost the game!

You can replenish your fuel, rockets and bombs by picking up the powerup icons. You can also land at your base to obtain new supplies.

There are different tactics you can apply:  you can try to destroy the buildings, but also go after your enemy with gunfire or rockets.  Or you could pick powerups near your island, so the enemy cannot replenish.

Have fun!
